import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { EComService } from 'src/app/e.com.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { username!:string; password!:string; constructor(private service:EComService){} login(){ } }
